titles.title: Justice for Armored Car Crew Members Act of 2022
Justice for Armored Car Crew Members Act of 2022
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that robbery of armored cars constitutes bank robbery, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Justice for Armored Car Crew Members Act of 2022
This bill makes the robbery of an armored car or armored car company building an offense under the federal bank robbery statute.
